data.source: /Users/shtlpmac019/Library/CloudStorage/OneDrive-ShortHillsTechPvtLtd/Desktop/AGENTS/AGENT/agentic_apqr/APQR_Segregated/LIMS/Batch_April_May_Batch_4/04. Internal QC Register & COA/QC Report Register.xlsx

deviation_details.description: Cartons printed with incorrect strength '650 mg' instead of '325 mg'
deviation_details.immediate_action: Operation immediately stopped, affected materials segregated and quarantined under QA supervision

root_cause_analysis.root_cause: Operator selected incorrect label template due to oversight. Absence of system-level lockout and missed second-person verification allowed wrong template selection.
contributing_factors: No system lockout for template selection

immediate.action: Segregation and destruction of 60 misprinted cartons
immediate.verification: Photographic evidence and destruction log attached (QA/DEST/2025/045)
Verified by QA prior to restart

systemic.action: System-level lockout for label template control
Revised SOP for label printing and verification (PKG-SOP-014, Rev.02)

training.topic: Revised Label Printing and Verification SOP (PKG-SOP-014, Rev.02)
training.outcome: All attendees understood revised procedure; competency verified

effectiveness_verification.verification_method: Post-CAPA verification across two consecutive batches

management_review.conclusion: All CAPA actions completed within timelines. No product released with incorrect labeling. Process improvements verified effective.

impact_assessment.product_quality: No impact - all affected units contained and destroyed
impact_assessment.regulatory: Incident contained; no regulatory reporting required
impact_assessment.batch_disposition: Batch ASP-25-004 released after verification of corrective actions
